The City Council of Columbus, Texas

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Office** | **Name** | **Elected** |
| Mayor | Lori An Gobert | Appointed 2018, Re-Elected 2023 |
| Place 1 | Keith Cummings | Appointed 2016, Re-Elected 2023 |
| Place 2 | Ronny Daley | Elected 2021, Re-Elected 2023 |
| Place 3 | Paige Sciba | Elected 2022, Re-Elected 2024 |
| Place 4 | Michael Ridlen | Elected 2022, Re-Elected 2024 |
| Place 5 | Chuck Rankin | Elected 2010, Re-Elected 2024 |

There are six members on the City Council: one Mayor and five Council Members. The entire Council is elected at large for each of five places by the voters of the City. Each member serves a two year term. Thus, 3 of the members are voted on one year, with the remaining members, including the Mayor, elected the following year.  
  
The Mayor and Council appoint the City Manager, who serves as the Chief Administrator of the City organization. Columbus practices a Council-Manager form of government.  
  
The Columbus City Council meets the second and fourth Monday of each month.
